_header: Cunning and virtue is not set by
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 338.
_description: Moral precepts — one stanza rhyme royal

Longleat254.First Lines:
Cunyng and vertu is not sett byNo mervaile is thowe we prospare
                    not…
Longleat254.Last Lines:
…For lacke of youth cunyng & vertueWe haue no grace othre
                    miseries teschewe
Longleat254.Editions:
Bergen,  Henry,
                        ed.  
             Lydgate’s Fall of Princes.
             4 vols. 
             EETS
